parameters.content: Review bus options and book ticket to Islamabad

entities.photo_description: latest photo of sunset at Badshahi Mosque
entities.caption: Another beautiful sunset in Lahore! #Lahore #Sunset #BadshahiMosque

output.title: Create Instagram Post
output.body: Finds the latest sunset photo from Badshahi Mosque in Google Photos and prepares it for an Instagram feed post with a caption.

parameters.action_description: Search for photos with the description 'sunset at Badshahi Mosque' and select the most recent one
Create a new 'Feed Post' with the image '{selected_photo}' and the caption 'Another beautiful sunset in Lahore! #Lahore #Sunset #BadshahiMosque'

entities.reply_content: Thanks! It was an amazing experience.

output.title: Reply to Ali on Facebook
output.body: Finds the comment from Ali Hassan on the Hunza trip post and replies to it.

parameters.action_description: Navigate to notifications and find the comment from 'Ali Hassan' on the post about 'my recent trip to Hunza'
Reply to the selected comment with the text: 'Thanks! It was an amazing experience.'

entities.sharing_comment: This is an interesting development for the tech scene in Pakistan.

output.body: Finds a news article on Dawn News about the new tech policy and shares it on X (Twitter) with a comment.

parameters.action_description: Find the latest article about the 'new government tech policy'

parameters.message: This is an interesting development for the tech scene in Pakistan. {article_link}

output.title: Coordinate Trip to Airport

parameters.action_description: Search for flight status of 'PK-302'

parameters.message: Hi everyone, here are the flight details for my trip: {flight_status}

output.title: Pay LESCO Electricity Bill
output.body: Navigates through the HBL Konnect app to pay the LESCO electricity bill for the specified consumer ID.

parameters.action_description: Navigate to the 'Bill Payment' section
Select biller 'LESCO' and input consumer ID '1234567890123'
Confirm payment for the amount '{bill_details.amount}'

output.title: Start Morning Briefing
output.body: Gathers the weather, first calendar event, and top news headlines, then plays a morning playlist.

parameters.action_description: Get today's weather forecast for Lahore
Get the first event scheduled for today
Fetch the top 3 news headlines
Play the 'Morning Coffee' playlist

output.title: Prepare for Load Shedding
output.body: Checks the load shedding schedule and reminds the user to charge their devices if an outage is imminent.

parameters.action_description: Check load shedding schedule for 'DHA Phase 6'

parameters.content: Charge all devices! Load shedding starts at {outage_time}.

output.title: Plan Weekend Movie with Asif
output.body: Finds action movie showtimes at Cinepax, and then asks Asif on WhatsApp which one he wants to see.

parameters.action_description: Search for 'action' movie showtimes at 'Cinepax' for this weekend

parameters.message: Hey Asif, want to catch a movie this weekend? Here are the showtimes at Cinepax: {movie_times}. Let me know which one works for you!

entities.video_topic: my recent food tour of Anarkali Bazaar
entities.caption: You have to try the gol gappay here! #LahoreFood #StreetFood #Anarkali

output.title: Create & Post Food Vlog
output.body: Finds the latest food tour video, edits it in CapCut with music, and posts it to TikTok.

parameters.action_description: Find the latest video file related to 'Anarkali Bazaar food tour'
Create a new project with the video '{source_video_clip}' and add the audio track 'trending_punjabi_song.mp3'
Upload the video '{edited_vlog}' with the caption 'You have to try the gol gappay here! #LahoreFood #StreetFood #Anarkali'

output.title: Leaving Home Routine
output.body: Secures the house by turning off lights, adjusting the AC, and locking the main door via the Tuya Smart app.

parameters.action_description: Turn off the device named 'Living Room Lights'
Set the temperature of 'Bedroom AC' to 28 degrees Celsius
Activate the 'Lock' function for the device 'Main Door Lock'

output.title: Prepare for Online Class
output.body: Downloads lecture notes from Coursera, opens them in a PDF reader, and sets a reminder to join the Zoom call.

parameters.action_description: Download the latest PDF lecture notes for the course 'Machine Learning with Python'
Open the file '{lecture_notes_pdf}'

parameters.content: Join Machine Learning class on Zoom

output.title: Split Dinner Bill
output.body: Calculates and sends a bill split request to friends using EasyPaisa, then notifies them on WhatsApp.

parameters.action_description: Start a 'Split Bill' request for a total of '4500' with contacts 'Usman' and 'Bilal'

parameters.message: Hey guys, I've split the bill on EasyPaisa. Please pay your share using this link: {payment_request_link}

output.title: Apply for Job at Techlogix
output.body: Finds the user's CV, then drafts an email in Outlook to apply for the Senior Python Developer role found on LinkedIn.

parameters.action_description: Search for the file named 'My_CV_2025.pdf'

parameters.subject: Job Application: Senior Python Developer (via LinkedIn)
parameters.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

Please find my CV attached for the Senior Python Developer position I saw advertised on LinkedIn. I am very interested in this opportunity.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best Regards,

output.title: Add Headphones to Wishlist
output.body: Searches for the Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones on Daraz, checks the price, and adds them to the user's wishlist.

parameters.action_description: Search for the product 'Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones'
From the page '{product_page}', find the current price and add the item to the 'Wishlist'

output.title: Daily Spanish Lesson
output.body: Opens Duolingo for a daily Spanish lesson and then opens Google Keep to take notes on new vocabulary.

parameters.action_description: Start a new lesson for the 'Spanish' language course
Create a new note with the title 'New Spanish Vocabulary'

output.title: Start Morning Commute
output.body: Checks the traffic to Arfa Tower and then resumes the last played podcast on Spotify for the drive.

parameters.action_description: Get the current travel time and traffic conditions for the route to 'Arfa Tower'
Resume playing the last listened to episode of the podcast 'The Joe Rogan Experience'

output.title: Buy Ticket for Lahore Music Meet
output.body: Purchases a ticket for the Lahore Music Meet via Bookme.pk and automatically adds the event to the user's Google Calendar.

parameters.action_description: Search for and select the event 'Lahore Music Meet'
Purchase 1 ticket and complete payment using 'EasyPaisa'

output.title: Scan and Save CNIC
output.body: Uses Microsoft Lens to scan a CNIC, saves it as a PDF, and uploads it to the 'Important Documents' folder in Google Drive.

parameters.action_description: Scan a document in 'ID Card' mode and save as 'CNIC_Scan.pdf'
Upload the file from '{scanned_doc_path}' to the folder named 'Important Documents'

output.title: Find New Pakistani Startup Podcast
output.body: Searches for podcasts about Pakistani startups on Spotify and subscribes to the top result.

parameters.action_description: Search for podcasts with the topic 'Pakistani startup stories'
From the list '{podcast_results}', select the top result and 'Follow' it

output.title: Perform Device Storage Cleanup
output.body: Frees up storage space by clearing the cache of all apps and deleting old files from the Downloads and WhatsApp Sent folders.

parameters.action_description: Run the 'Clear Cache' function for all installed applications
Navigate to the 'Downloads' folder and delete all files older than 30 days
Navigate to the 'WhatsApp Images/Sent' folder and delete all files older than 90 days

output.body: Immediately sends the user's current location to their emergency contact 'Father' via SMS and then initiates a phone call.

parameters.message: EMERGENCY: I need help. My current location is: {current_location}
